# Landing Page CTA Audit Criteria

Use this to score any landing page. Score 1–3 per item. Higher total = stronger CTA.

---

## Visibility (1–3)

| Criterion | 1 | 2 | 3 |
|-----------|---|---|---|
| Primary CTA visible without scroll? | No | Partial | Yes |
| CTA stands out from page (color, size)? | No | Somewhat | Yes |
| Secondary CTA (if any) doesn't compete? | Competes | Minor conflict | Clear hierarchy |

---

## Copy and intent (1–3)

| Criterion | 1 | 2 | 3 |
|-----------|---|---|---|
| CTA text is action-oriented? | Vague | Okay | Strong |
| CTA matches the offer (no bait-and-switch)? | No | Partial | Yes |
| Urgency or reason to act (if appropriate)? | None | Weak | Clear |

---

## Form and friction (1–3)

| Criterion | 1 | 2 | 3 |
|-----------|---|---|---|
| Minimal fields for the offer? | Too many | Acceptable | Minimal |
| Error states and validation clear? | Confusing | Okay | Clear |
| Mobile-friendly (tap targets, layout)? | No | Partial | Yes |

---

## Handoff (1–3)

| Criterion | 1 | 2 | 3 |
|-----------|---|---|---|
| Thank-you page confirms and delivers? | Missing/broken | Basic | Strong |
| Lead flows to CRM or nurture? | No | Partial | Yes |
| Clear next step for the user? | No | Unclear | Yes |

---

**Score:** 12–15 = strong. 8–11 = needs work. Below 8 = priority fix.

**Focus:** Lowest-scoring section first.
